Key Match Events: Anthony Edwards struggled offensively, shooting 6-for-23 from the field and finishing with 16 points
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Minnesota Timberwolves stunned many by trading one of their cornerstone players, Karl-Anthony Towns, to the New York Knicks in exchange for Julius Randle and Donte DiVincenzo
Others: Julius Randle made his preseason debut for Minnesota, recording 15 points, six rebounds and five assists on 6-for-12 shooting in 26 minutes
Rudy Gobert was dominant inside, posting 13 points and 17 rebounds
Donte DiVincenzo added 17 points off the bench
Lonzo Ball, making his return after two years, impressed with 10 points in 15 minutes, shooting 4-for-6 from the field, including two 3-pointers
